attributes.action: reinstatement of Nigel Evans as deputy speaker of the house.
attributes.additional_details: After being found not guilty.  Having to do the right thing at the time and stand down, during proceedings.  Should be given the opportunity to follow through with his dreams of becoming speaker of the house, with immidate effect.

rejection.details: The election to Speaker of the House is a matter for the House of Commons and not HM Government.
